Superb car best SUV cat I like it very much super look and best preference car look is awsome best for family and friend and best for the tour.

Feels premium inside compared to other SUVs. The average mileage I am getting is 12kmpl, maximum I got on long Highways was 16.4kmpl. The drive is smooth. No cabin noise. I would recommend everyone to choose white colour or silver. White looks premium on real-world roads.

Best car in its segment, best comfort, best mileage, nice features in this price range, and its best in safety. Also, it's a strong car by Hyundai, I enjoy every movement in this Hyundai has made a perfect 7-seater SUV for their customer, we get every feature in this car like a fully digital instrument cluster, panoramic sunroof, big touc...
The car is loaded with features. But poor in build quality, facing major issues in the quality of the interior, and the city mileage is not more than 9kmpl which is too low.

Best car for my family and for a long tour beat in class features, a comfortable drive and enough space for a big travelling bag. Low maintenance charge, silent cabin, great visibility, and smooth handling.

Rating_Title: Hyundai Alcazar Diesel Platinum With Smooth Drive

Must buy against MG Hector or Kia Carens front headlights is weak to drive in rain otherwise everything is upto the mark like bose sound system, pan...
Good only for people who want a compact 7-6 seater crossover or maybe high mileage. It has less space, power, and build quality and personally, it feels uglier than the competition.

Best car in this segment I had both 15 cars for my relatives I suggest you should also buy it gives good mileage and have a high torque the safest car I had also done a crash test of this car it is so durable the light are white they don't flicker and give a clear view of the road it has a great road presence.
The engine is super refined and has an excellent mileage car. Its last row is best for kids and pets. It is value for money.

The Car is just fantastic and it's totally beast. It has got all the features you have dreamt of. The mileage is okay, but performance with those 7 seats is totally Insane. Its comfort is awesome.

Awesome feel really looks like a real XUV in this price range and Hyundai steering and clutch are very smooth. The interior is awesome and the display looks cool. The main thing is middle and back seats are both foldable which is a very attractive thing in this linear SUV.
I have good experience with this car, comfortable, safe, and value for money car. The performance of the car is also great.
Good features. Best interior quality I like this SUV Alcazar. Awesome experience. Mountain ride car.
The car is good and the base variant is value for money, the sunroof is large and the touchscreen is very good and the best in this segment.
